headline: What Is Changing the Avery Dennison Narrative After Recent Analyst Upgrades
summary: Avery Dennison’s latest price target update reflects a more nuanced, but ultimately steady, view of the stock’s long term potential, with fair value holding near $202.36 per share despite only fractional tweaks to the underlying assumptions. A slightly lower discount rate and a marginal uptick in long run revenue growth expectations point to rising confidence in the company’s ability to compound value through disciplined execution and consistent free cash flow generation. Read on to see what...
